Name: Skin Framework

Options.Name: Textures-only (Legacy, Deprecated)
Options.Description:
Only enables glow (emissive) on the skin, but only requires editing the textures, and mostly does not support material edits beyond what could be achieved in vanilla.

Use this option if your mod only contains textures, or if it contains materials but the glow doesn't work with the other option.

Creating new mods based on this option is not recommended, as it is likely to be removed in the Atramentum Luminis Dawntrail update.

Options.Name: Textures and Materials
Options.Description:
Enables all the features of Atramentum Luminis on the skin, but requires editing both the textures and the materials.

Use this option if your mod contains both textures and materials.
